entry.def: Someone who is unmarried is not married.

example.ex: They refused to rent an apartment to an unmarried couple.
example.tran: 他们拒绝把公寓租给未婚情侣。

Sentence.sentence: Linda Waite of the University of Chicago has found that a married older man with heart disease can expect to live nearly four years longer than an unmarried man with a healthy heart.
the married are happier than the unmarried
unmarried people are likely to suffer in later life

sentences.en: Being an unmarried mother used to carry a social stigma.
sentences.cn: 做未婚母亲在社会上曾是不光彩的事。

sentences.en: She disapproves of unmarried couples living together.
She left no will and was unmarried.
sentences.cn: 她没留下遗嘱，也没结过婚。
